prompt.title: Fallback Prompt
prompt.goal:
Stop all running activities from the Agent. If the Agent is running a bash script, stop it If the Agent is running a Java maven build, stop it. If the Agent is running coding activity, stop it. If the Agent is running any other activity, stop it.
If you have any local changes, commit them and push to the branch.
if a running process has some concerns, share a summary.
Put the Agent in a terminal state as FINISHED.
